answers.answer: Hi!It is difficult to comment really without examination. Excess alcohol intake, partial seizures, diabetes, spinal nerve compression high up and low calcium levels all cause strange sensations in head region. Wisdom tooth is another cause. Do discuss this with your doctor and get yourself examined. Take care!

question: Brain has a sorta moment where like, a very small area is having some trouble, a zinging kinda feeling, unpredicatble and it's..fast, doesn't feel dangerous, But I can't relax when I feel it, it feel's like at that moment my brain's turning a knot in that area...had it for almost all my life..
title: Just can't tell what it is....
